about

I’m currently a 1st year student at the University of Washington Bothell, majoring in Computer Science & Software Engineering with Information Security, and minoring in Retail Management. I previously graduated Bellevue College with an Associates in the Arts & Sciences.

I have previous experience working in various programming languages such as Java, C#, and JavaScript/TypeScript, and I am familiar with frameworks and libraries such as Micronaut, ASP.NET, React.JS, and Next.js.

When not working with technology, I also worked several projects with Main Home Solutions, including working with the Snoqualmie Indian Tribe to create a walkway for their Early Childhood Development Center. Outside of that,
